short_description: fastpath function used to apply predefined numeric operation on a specified target column range.
long_description: fastpath function used to apply predefined numeric operation on a specified target column range.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which numeric operation needs to be performed.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which numeric operation needs to be performed.

argument_clauses.name: OutputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names to give to the output columns which will contain output of the numeric opeation on the columns values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names to give to the output columns which will contain output of the numeric opeation on the columns values.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: ApplyMethod
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the numeric method which will be used on the target columns. Supported ApplyMethod are {LOG,EXP,SININV,TANH,SIGMOID}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the numeric method which will be used on the target columns. Supported ApplyMethod are {LOG,EXP,SININV,TANH,SIGMOID}.

argument_clauses.name: SigmoidStyle
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the sigmoid style which will be used on the target columns.. Supported SigmoidStyle are {LOGIT,MODIFIEDLOGIT,TANH}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the numeric style which will be used on the target columns. Supported SigmoidStyle are {LOGIT,MODIFIEDLOGIT,TANH}.

argument_clauses.name: InPlace
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to use the same column name for the resulted target columns.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to use the same column name for the resulted target columns.
